General.Name: VPN Technologies Inc
General.Description: Energy Plug Technologies Corp. develops application technology in Canada. The company provides virtual private network services to protect identity and personal data online for retail market and small and medium-sized enterprises; and VPN Logix, a mobile VPN service. It is also developing solutions for the storage of hydrogen as an energy carrier. The company was formerly known as VPN Technologies Inc. and changed its name to Energy Plug Technologies Corp. in June 2023. Energy Plug Technologies Corp. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1681 Chestnut Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6J 4M6
